issuer.name: Northeastern University (NU)
issuer.description: Founded in 1898, we’re renowned for our experiential learning model, high-impact research, deep partnerships, and worldwide reach. From day one we’ve pursued innovative ways of teaching and research that place a premium on experience and engagement with the world. Today, our signature approach erases traditional boundaries, empowering not only students, but faculty, alumni, partners, and innovators to solve problems and pursue impact.

name: Essentials for Academic Success
description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated a comprehensive understanding of Northeastern University’s resources and services. By earning this badge, students:  showcased their ability to navigate their graduate journey effectively, upheld academic and professional expectations, communicated professionally, and navigated their academic journey with integrity and respect.

criteria.narrative:
- Complete all 6 modules of the Master's and Professional Doctorate Student Orientation in Canvas. 
- Complete all 6 end-of-module reflection surveys. 
- Complete the orientation feedback survey.

achievement.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated a comprehensive understanding of Northeastern University’s resources and services. By earning this badge, students:  showcased their ability to navigate their graduate journey effectively, upheld academic and professional expectations, communicated professionally, and navigated their academic journey with integrity and respect.
achievement.name: Essentials for Academic Success

credentialSubject.narrative: Awarded for completing requirements in group Master's and Professional Doctorate Orientation: Master's and Professional Doctorate Orientation
